text: Moros y cristianos is a festival celebrated in parts of Spain. Moros y cristianos may also refer to: * Moros y Cristianos of Alcoy, a festival in Alcoy, Alicante, Spain * Moros y Cristianos (dish), a Cuban recipe for black beans and white rice ==See also== * Reconquista, centuries of battle between Christians and Muslims in Spain * Moresca, a Spanish folk dance representing the battles between the Christians and Moors (Muslims) * Moreška, a Croatian sword dance, originally representing Christians and Moors, but later changed to Turks and Moors in the 19th century
title: Moros y cristianos (disambiguation)
